content: ivy leave motif by kamidake materials scrap amount of worsted weight yarn i used caron simply soft equipment g hook 4 0mm gauge not important you can vary the size of the leaf by using different weight yarn and different size hooks abbreviations chain chain sl slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet treble triple crochet picot ch3 sl into first chain instructions ch4 sl into first chain to make a loop rnd1 ch3 double_crochet 11 into loop sl into first double_crochet 11 rnd2 ch5 single_crochet into 2nd chain from hook single_crochet into each of next 3 chain single_crochet into next double_crochet from rnd1 this makes the stem if you want a longer stem simply increase the number of chains for the next part instruction within is done in a single stitch then move on to the next double_crochet picot double_crochet treble_crochet picot treble_crochet double_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet picot treble_crochet double_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet double_crochet treble_crochet picot treble_crochet double_crochet picot double_crochet sl into next st and fasten_off this pattern is for personal use please do not distribute in any way shape or form finished items may be sold but please refer back to me kamidake as the pattern s author and a link to my etsy site http //www etsy com/shop/kamidake
